title: Stupid riot and there match making system
body: Stupid riot get a life you literally pair people with idiots all day literally im trying to learn and play how am i suppose to when you fkin match me with fkin trollers so by far this is the worst server ever

replies.body: What about the people who have the misfortune of being matched with you?
If you rage at your team with that attitude, people are likely to play a lot worse, and you will lose more games. Always look to improve yourself, and your teamwork.
